issue.title: [C++] Add better coverage for filesystem tell.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16226](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16226). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add a C++ generic file system test that writes wrote N bytes to a file. then seeks to N/2 and and read the remainder.  Verify the remainder bytes are N/2 and expected from the bytes writter.
